import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Col, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, Button, } from "reactstrap"; import Select from '@material-ui/core/Select' import MenuItem from '@material-ui/core/MenuItem'; import TextField from '@material-ui/core/TextField'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { getUserById } from '../../services/UsersService'; export default class UserDetail extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { id: props.location.id, disable: true, user: {}, } } componentDidMount() { this.getUser() } getUser = () => { getUserById(this.state.id).then(response => { this.setState({ user : response.data}) }) } toggleUpdate = () => { this.setState({ disable: !this.state.disable }) } render() { return (
Detail User
this.setState({ user: {...this.state.user, birth_date: value.target.value}})} InputLabelProps={{ shrink: true, }} disabled={this.state.disabled} />
) } }
